name: Pandora Classic
description: My styles are moving to the Userstyles.world platform. You can continue using this style, however it is likely to break in the future as it will no longer be updated. To continue supporting my work and receive future updates, please download this style here. You'll need the Stylus extension, which is free and open-source at the Chrome Web Store. Hope to see you there!
additional_info: This project's on GitHub! Latest Version: 1.0 Released on: February 18th, 2023 By installing and using this theme, you agree to the End-User License Agreement. Release Notes: --Initial commit --Thanks for your support! This theme may not be copied and/or redistributed in any way, shape or form, excluding the one copy you obtain from my Userstyles or GitHub page.
